categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: During the Great Galactic War between the years 3681 and 3653 BBY, a commander led a portion of the reconstituted Sith Empire's armada in an effort to take the Brema sector from the Galactic Republic. The commander was a Sith of either Human or Sith pureblood descent, and during the battle over Ord Ibanna, the Sith's fleet fleet took heavy losses and the commander was ultimately killed. In the aftermath of the commander's death, Rycus Kilran, a non-Force-sensitive Human tactical advisor, took command of the fleet and led it to victory over the Republic.
The Sith commander was first mentioned in Rycus Kilran's entry on The Holonet, an online database of background information on the upcoming LucasArts video game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
